snippet: Villagers set up armed patrols and roadblocks in the township of Ayutla de los Libres almost one month ago to defend themselves against crime, saying the authorities had failed to ensure peace and safety.
lead_paragraph: Villagers set up armed patrols and roadblocks in the township of Ayutla de los Libres almost one month ago to defend themselves against crime, saying the authorities had failed to ensure peace and safety.

headline.main: In Mexico, Vigilante Villagers Plan to Try 53 Prisoners
headline.print_headline: Mexico: Vigilante Villagers Plan to Try 53 Prisoners
